content.text: Two months ago, I went to Mexico City with my family. It was our first time in Mexico. We took a plane from Chicago and arrived in Mexico City in the evening. We drove to our hotel and checked in. The hotel was very nice and had a lot of colorful decorations and a pool.
content.name: mnop

content.text: We came to Mexico City for a week and visited many interesting places. We went to the Zocalo and saw the Cathedral and the National Palace. We went to Frida Kahlo’s Museum and learned about her life and art. We saw the Teotihuacan Pyramids and climbed to the top. I took pictures of all places and posted them on my Instagram. We also ate some delicious Mexican food like tacos, enchiladas, and pozole. We drank horchata. Too bad I didn’t buy gifts because I didn’t have enough money. Did you know that Mexico City was over a lake?
